description: Stretch one of your arms with the palm of the hand facing forward and pull your fingers up for 10 seconds by hand.
Stretch your arm against your chest and pull it using the other arm for 10 seconds by arm.
Pull your neck with the help of the hand to the right and left, remaining in the position for a few seconds.
With both hands on the back of the head, take it down, stretching the back of the region.
Cross his legs and go down with his hands stretched toward the floor.Repeat the movement with the other leg on the front.
Sitting, open your legs and try to touch your palms on the floor, repeat 3 times for 5 seconds.
Pull the knee against the chest and hold, switch off after 10 seconds.
Sitting, cross a leg and tilt your trunk ahead, switch from leg after 10 seconds.
Sitting, close your eyes and cover them with your palms for 2 minutes, then open normally.
In some open environment, look as far as you can in four directions for 3s, just stir eyes.Repeat 3 times.
Using thumbs, massage the area below the eyebrows in circular movements for 15 seconds.
Standing, rotate the waist as much as you can to the left, hold for five seconds. Repeat to the right.
